name: Dishonor Before Death
description:
HOW TO PLAY

A/D - Move Left/Right

SPACE - Jump

Mouse1 - Attack

Mouse2 - Parry

F - Return to menu

Parry an attack right before it hits you to nullify it, miss a parry and be locked into a long recovery. Any damaging attack can be parried.

TIPS FOR SUB BOSSES

Heart- Don't hold down attack! Hit it once and look up to make sure no projectiles are coming towards you.

Sorrow- Hit the boss a few times before moving to avoid the projectiles.

Despair- Either parry the lasers to open up the arena or stay still and parry oncoming projectiles while hitting the boss when it passes by

If you die in a regular boss fight you can choose to gear up and try again. You don't get the privillege of dying here. Die to the boss? Come right back to fight another one. It's either you win or you give up trying.
